short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prospecting on the go - discover the fastest path to your next opportunity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aidentified Sidecar is your personal prospecting assistant. While you’re researching LinkedIn, activate your sidekick and uncover additional insights into your prospects and clients. Uncover non-obvious pathways to connect through neighbors, friends, and colleagues. Fuel your conversations with powerful information including household information, life events, inferred income and even interests such as golf, investing or cooking. Make sure you’re targeting the right people, at the right time and, most importantly, with a warm introduction!

Whether you’re in Sales, Marketing, HR, Customer Success or Customer Service, this is for you. Whether you’re in financial services, insurance, real estate, non-profit, educational organizations, enterprise corporations or anywhere else, this is for you. 
 
This extension is FREE for Aidentified subscribers.
